overview: Developer of arts based social media website dedicated to raising funds for every and any cause needed. Mosaics are used to display and inform the world of what is seen by real people in regions all around the world. Erik has been inspired by Iran’s most recent demonstrations against the brutal dictator. Furthermore its clear that his vision of an interactive Mosaic consisting of user’s uploaded images can tell the real stories but also is understood by Erik that it unites people from all around the world by shiwng who and where people are sending their support. Everyday new and terrible events are shaping the world and Erik Olivar is trying with bad luck to document these events using multimedia, technology, art and social media.
